author: EithneDraoct
body:
My OCD doesn’t work that way. I can only hold 4-6 stocks and they need to be in nice numbers. I can’t have one share, it has to be 3,5,10,15,20,25,etc. 

If I buy 6, then I need to make the others 4, 12, 16, etc. 

I have 9 ADI right now and it kills me just to look at it.

I like your portfolio though. It’s clean and has a theme.

author: Bombad2
body: More of a niche-tech but [Analog Devices is buying out its competitor](https://www.marketwatch.com/story/chip-maker-analog-poised-to-buy-rival-maxim-integrated-for-more-than-17-billion-2020-07-12)

author: ScopePerspective
body: MXIM rebounding (getting acquired by Analog Devices) was among the easiest of trades today.

author: goofy-boots
body: $ADI acquires it's largest competitor giving it double the market cap. Stock plummets. This market is so fucking irrational.

author: ScopePerspective
body:
After the Analog Devices purchase announcement this morning, Maxim (MXIM) was up to $73.00 after open. It got spiked in that drawdown like everything else, and ended at $69 (heh). 

So, I'm long MXIM into the open, expecting a bounceback. 

Also went balls deep in NIO at the end of trading. Should be a nice bounce back after the fuckery this afternoon. Who knows! I've got more spare powder to take advantage of tech-pocalypse pt 2

author: goofy-boots
body: ADI is a sleeper. Recent merger with MAXIM will be ridic

author: TexanBulldog
body: Right now, Analog devices ADI is in the works of buying Maxim MXIM through an all stock deal. Is there a way to capitalize on this play? I noticed huge gains by both RUN and VSLR recently when they announced an all stock deal.

author: Modaddy786
body: CCI is the one of the best pure 5G plays full stop. It’s run up like others but it has more value & you can play this (dollar cost average) but these are other great 5G plays: ADI, IIVI , AMT, SBA to mention a few.

author: SB52Birds
body: I would say keep AMD, i’m currently holding AMD as well tho so take this with a grain of salt. We got semis reporting earnings this week and with ADI and MU having already reported positive earnings, I see no reason as to why AMD or TSM will be any different. Just my $.02.

author: goofy-boots
body: whatta y'all think about ADI? Just merged with MAXIM

author: choose_a_use
body: ADI to acquire maxim at current market cap. Doesn't make sense why maxim would want to be sold
